title: HoudahGeo 5.4.2 / 6.0.1 – Photo geocoding and geotagging

title: Ember 1.8.5 – Versatile digital scrapbook
content: Ember (was LittleSnapper) is your digital scrapbook of things that inspire you: websites, photos, apps or other things.
